pageContent:
FOREVER - Company Profile & FAQ
About FOREVER
FOREVER is a contemporary clothing brand dedicated to creating timeless, stylish, and
comfortable apparel for Men, Women, and Kids. Established in 2018, our mission is to empower
individuals through fashion — offering quality designs that last beyond seasons. From everyday
essentials to premium winterwear, FOREVER stands for durability, sustainability, and effortless
style.
Our Vision

style.
Our Vision
To be a global leader in fashion by redefining modern lifestyle clothing and promoting sustainable
fashion culture.
Our Mission
To design and deliver affordable, high-quality apparel that brings comfort and confidence to every
customer.
Our Products
FOREVER’s product line includes a wide range of apparel crafted for all age groups:
• Men’s Collection: Shirts, jeans, jackets, and sweatshirts.
• Women’s Collection: Tops, dresses, skirts, and coats.

• Kids’ Collection: Playful and colorful clothing for comfort and fun.
• Seasonal Collection: Winterwear essentials including hoodies, trench coats, and thermal tops.
Each product undergoes a strict quality control process to ensure durability, comfort, and perfect fit.
Quality & Sustainability
We use responsibly sourced cotton, eco-friendly dyes, and recycled packaging materials to
minimize environmental impact. Our production partners are certified by international labor

standards to ensure ethical manufacturing.
Shipping & Delivery
• Orders are processed within 1–2 business days.
• Standard delivery: 3–5 business days (domestic), 7–10 days (international).
• Express delivery: 1–2 business days (available in selected regions).
• Customers receive a tracking link and live updates after dispatch.
• Delivery partners include DHL, UPS, and FedEx for global coverage.
Return & Refund Policy
• Returns are accepted within 14 days from delivery.

• Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original packaging with tags attached.
• Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5–7 business days.
• Exchange requests can be made for size or color replacements, subject to stock availability.
• Damaged or incorrect items should be reported within 48 hours of delivery.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
QuestionAnswer
What sizes are available?We offer sizes from SMALL to XXLARGE across all main collections.
Do you ship internationally?Yes, FOREVER ships to over 80 countries worldwide.
Can I track my order?Once shipped, you’ll receive an email with a live tracking link.
What payment methods are accepted?We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

Can I cancel or modify my order?Orders can be modified or cancelled within 12 hours after placement.
Do you offer discounts?Yes, seasonal sales and membership discounts are available on our website.
Are your products eco-friendly?Yes, we use sustainable fabrics and ethical manufacturing methods.
What should I do if I receive a defective item?Please contact our support team within 48 hours with photos for a quick resolution.

How do I initiate a return?Visit our Returns page and fill out the online return form using your order ID.
Do you offer gift wrapping?Yes, you can select our eco-friendly gift wrapping option during checkout.
Contact Information
Email: support@forever.com
Phone: +1 (800) 234-5678
Website: www.forever.com
Address: 202 Fashion Avenue, Los Angeles, CA, USA
Follow us on social media:
